document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the Ambrysus pulchellus Montandon species complex (Heteroptera: Nepomorpha: Naucoridae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the Ambrysus pulchellus Montandon species complex (Heteroptera: Nepomorpha: Naucoridae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Ambrysus californicus Montandon 1897
: Verh. Zool.-Bot. Ges. Wien, 47: 12, 18–19 (original description, key).
A. californicus : Torre-Bueno 1906
, Proc. Entomol. Soc. Wash., 8: 54 (list of taxa).

A. californicus : Kirkaldy & Torre-Bueno 1909
, Proc. Entomol. Soc. Wash., 10: 186 (list of taxa).

A. californicus : Montandon 1909
, Bull. Soc. Sci. Buc.-Roum., 17: 320 (key).

A. californicus : Van Duzee 1916
, Check List Hem., p. 52 (list of taxa).

A. californicus : Van Duzee 1917
, Univ. Calif. Publ. Entom., 2: 458 (list of taxa).

A. californicus : Hungerford 1920
, Univ. Kans. Sci. Bull.,11: 199, 204 (key, translation of original description).

A. bohartorum Usinger 1946
: Univ. Kans. Sci. Bull., 31: 195–196 (original description).

A. californicus : Usinger 1946
, Univ. Kans. Sci. Bull., 31: 196 (morphology).

A. bohartorum : La Rivers 1949
, Bull. So. Calif. Acad. Sci., 47: 108 (key).

A. californicus : La Rivers 1949
, Bull. So. Calif. Acad. Sci., 47: 108 (key).

A. californicus : De Carlo 1950
, An. Soc. Cient. Argent., 150: 7 (list of taxa, distribution).

A. c. bohartorum : La Rivers 1951
, Univ. Calif. Publ. Entomol., 8: 309–310, 336 (subspecies status, habitus photo) (
NEW SYNONYM
).

A. c. californicus : La Rivers 1951
, Univ. Calif. Publ. Entomol., 8: 306–309, 336 (supplemental description, habitus photo).

A. californicus : Usinger 1956
, Aquat. Insects Calif., pp. 201 (morphology).

A. c. bohartorum : Usinger 1956
, Aquat. Insects Calif., pp. 202–203 (key).

A. c. californicus : Usinger 1956
, Aquat. Insects Calif., pp. 202–203 (key).

A. californicus : La Rivers 1965
, Biol. Soc. Nev. Occas. Pap., 4: 5 (subgeneric assignment, distribution).

A. c. bohartorum : La Rivers 1971
, Biol. Soc. Nev. Mem., 2: 66 (list of taxa).

A. c. californicus : La Rivers 1971
, Biol. Soc. Nev. Mem., 2: 66 (list of taxa).

A. c. bohartorum : Polhemus 1979
, Calif. Insect Surv. Bull., 21: 134–136 (key, distribution).

A. c. californicus : Polhemus 1979
, Calif. Insect Surv. Bull., 21: 134–136 (key, distribution).

A. californicus : Polhemus & Polhemus 1988
, Catal., p. 523 (list of taxa).

A. c. bohartorum : Polhemus & Polhemus 1988
, Catal., p. 523 (list of taxa).

A. c. californicus : Polhemus & Polhemus 1988
, Catal., p. 523 (list of taxa).

A. californicus :
Dinger et al. 2005
, Southwest. Nat., 50: 242 (list of taxa).

Diagnosis. ThIs spEcIEs cAN bE dIsTINGuIshEd fROm OThERs IN ThE cOmpLEx by ThE SGP pOsTERIOR mARGIN wITh A fOuR- LObEd AppEARANcE, wITh TwO cENTRAL LObEs ANd ROuNdEd pOsTEROLATERAL cORNERs. ThE cENTRAL LObEs ARE sLIGhTLy pROducEd pOsTERIORLy fuRThER ThAN ThE pOsTEROLATERAL cORNERs ( FIG. 3F ). ThE LATERAL mARGINs Of ThE SGP ARE NOT REfLExEd ANd ThE pOsTERIOR mARGIN Of LATEROsTERNITE VI Is sTRONGLy cONvEx ( FIG. 3F ). ThE mALE AGP Is EvENLy cuRvEd TO ThE RIGhT fROm bAsE TO ApEx ANd wIdEsT IN ThE bAsAL 2/3 ( FIG. 3B ). ThE psEudOpARAmEREs hAvE A mEdIAL cONvExITy ANd dO NOT TApER TO AN ApIcAL LObE; ThE pOsTEROmEsAL cORNERs Of ThE psEudOpARAmEREs ARE ROuNdEd ( FIG. 3C ). ThE scuTELLum hAs A dIsTINcT dARK bROwN dENdRITIc pATTERN ON A mEdIum bROwN bAcKGROuNd ( FIG. 3A ).

Discussion. ThIs spEcIEs wAs dEscRIbEd ( MONTANdON 1897 ) bAsEd ON A sINGLE mALE spEcImEN cOLLEcTEd IN sOuThERN CALIfORNIA ( UNITEd STATEs ). IN 1946 , UsINGER dEscRIbEd
A. bohartorum
fROm SONOmA COuNTy IN NORThERN CALIfORNIA ( UNITEd STATEs ) ANd suGGEsTEd ThAT ThE spEcIEs wAs sImILAR TO
A. californicus
, buT dIffEREd IN hAvING A bROAdER pRONOTum, wIdER EmbOLIA, ANd AcuTE pOsTEROLATERAL cORNERs Of AbdOmINAL TERGA III –V. HE cONsIdEREd ThE AcuTE pOsTEROLATERAL cORNERs TO bE sImILAR IN AppEARANcE TO ThOsE Of
A. mormon
MONTANdON. LA RIvERs (1951) ExAmINEd spEcImENs
Of A. bohartorum
ANd fOuNd ThAT ThE mORphOLOGIEs Of ThE mALE AGP ANd fEmALE SGP wERE IdENTIcAL TO ThAT
Of A. californicus
; ThEREfORE, hE pROpOsEd
A. bohartorum
TO bE A subspEcIEs
Of A. californicus
, wITh ThE AcuTE pOsTEROLATERAL AbdOmINAL cORNERs As ThE dIAGNOsTIc fEATuRE fOR
A. californicus bohartorum
UsINGER. AmONG spEcIEs Of
Ambrysus
, vARIOus ExTERNAL mORphOLOGIcAL chARAcTERs dIffER IN sIzE AmONG cONspEcIfIc pOpuLATIONs ANd hAvE bEEN usEd TO dETERmINE subspEcIEs bOuNdARIEs. SITEs ANd WILLIG (2000) ANALyzEd ExTERNAL mENsuRAL fEATuREs AmONG 13 pOpuLATIONs Of
A. mormon
ANd fOuNd ThAT ThE REsuLTs dId NOT suppORT ThE EsTAbLIshEd subspEcIfIc dEsIGNATIONs. ThE vARIATION IN LENGTh Of ThE pOsTEROLATERAL cORNERs Of ThE AbdOmINAL sEGmENTs IN spEcImENs
Of A. californicus
REpREsENTs TypIcAL vARIATION, Of whAT wE cONsIdER A NON-dIAGNOsTIc fEATuRE, ThROuGhOuT ThE dIsTRIbuTION Of ThE spEcIEs. ALsO, cONsIdERING ThE subspEcIEs As A GEOGRAphIcAL vARIETy ( MAyR 1982 ) wITh mORphOLOGIcAL uNIfORmITy IN ONE OR A fEw dIAGNOsTIc chARAcTERs ( WILsON & BROwN 1953 ), ThE subspEcIEs
Of A. californicus
shOuLd bE IdENTIfIAbLE ANd AssOcIATEd TO A pARTIcuLAR GEOGRAphIc AREA IN CALIfORNIA bAsEd ON ThE LENGTh Of ThE pOsTEROLATERAL cORNERs Of ThE AbdOmINAL sEGmENTs ANd ThERE shOuLd NOT bE OvERLAppING Of ThE RANGEs. ThIs Is NOT ThE cAsE bEcAusE ThE spEcIEs hAs A cONTINuOus dIsTRIbuTION IN wEsTERN CALIfORNIA (sEE ALsO dIsTRIbuTION mAp IN POLhEmus 1979 ) ANd pOpuLATIONs wITh bOTh cONdITIONs Of ThE pOsTEROLATERAL cORNERs Of ThE AbdOmINAL sEGmENTs OccuR (E.G.,
SAN LuIs
ObIspO CO.). Thus, bEcAusE bOTh chARAcTER sTATEs ARE pREsENT wIThIN pOpuLATIONs, wE cONsIdER ThE dEsIGNATION Of ThE subspEcIEs NOT vALId ANd pROpOsE ThE syNONymy Of
A. californicus bohartorum
wITh ThE NOmINATE subspEcIEs.
Variation. NO vARIATION wAs ObsERvEd IN ThE dIAGNOsTIc fEATuREs.
Repository. HOLOTypE Is hOusEd AT NHRS.

Distribution. ThIs spEcIEs Is ENdEmIc TO ThE wEsTERN pART Of ThE sTATE Of CALIfORNIA ( UNITEd STATEs ), whIch Is IN ThE PAcIfIc BORdER physIOGRAphIc pROvINcE ( FIG. 2 ). DINGER et al. (2005) REpORTEd ThIs spEcIEs fROm 10 LOcALITIEs IN ThE CuATRO CIéNEGAs bAsIN IN ThE NORThERN MExIcAN sTATE Of COAhuILA . ERIc C. DINGER KINdLy ALLOwEd us TO ExAmINE sOmE Of ThE spEcImENs Of NAucORIdAE cOLLEcTEd IN TwO LOcALITIEs (PuENTE ChIquITA ANd RíO GARAbATAL) IN ThE CuATRO CIéNEGAs bAsIN. WE fOuNd ThAT ThOsE spEcImENs ARE NOT
Ambrysus californicus
buT INsTEAd ARE
Ambrysus lunatus

UsINGER ANd
A. pulchellus
. WE AssERT ThAT
A. californicus Is
NOT dIsTRIbuTEd IN
MExIcO
; ThIs spEcIEs Is REsTRIcTEd TO ThE cOAsTAL RANGEs Of ThE wEsTERN sTATE Of CALIfORNIA IN ThE UNITEd STATEs .
Published records. UNITEd STATEs: CALIfORNIA; MéxIcO: COAhuILA ( MONTANdON 1897 ; LA RIvERs 1951 , 1971 ; POLhEmus 1979 ; DINGER et al . 2005).

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 3. Structures of
Ambrysus californicus
. (A) dorsal habitus of female, (B) 6th and 7th abdominal terga of male, (C) 8th abdominal tergum of male, (D) ventral surface of phallosoma, (E) left side of phallososma, (F) sternum VI and subgenital plate of female (terminal abdominal segments removed). plc = posterolateral corner. Size bar = 0.5 mm and applies only to figures D and E.
